summary: Internal email regarding the creation of two special project numbers for charges associated with Jeffrey Epstein, one for an After Action Team and another for regional costs, indicating financial tracking of the case.

persons.name: Regional Director Northeast Region
persons.context: Recipient of an email about establishing special project numbers for Epstein-related charges.

persons.name: Comptroller from Southeast
persons.context: Individual tasked with monitoring the After Action Team project number for Epstein charges.

connections.description: Collaborating on financial oversight for Epstein-related project numbers, with the Comptroller monitoring one project.

events.title: Establishment of Epstein Project Numbers
events.description: Internal decision to create two special project numbers for charges associated with Jeffrey Epstein, indicating financial tracking and resource allocation for the case.

keyFacts: Two special project numbers were created to track charges associated with Jeffrey Epstein.
One project number was designated for an 'After Action Team' under the Regional Director, monitored by a Comptroller from the Southeast.
The second project number was for all other costs from the Northeast Region.
The email indicates organizational financial planning and resource allocation following Epstein's arrest or death in August 2019.
